content.description:
Although slightly less polished Brown Collar delivers some rad burly crack climbing with some old skoool seasoning.

 Pitch 1 | 5.9+ | Head up a vegetated corner past several ledges to a bolted anchor. Climbs better than it looks. Be wary of some small loose pebbles on ledges. 

 Pitch 2 | 5.10+ | Jam up the off-fist crack to a ledge. From here move up a huecoed arete past several bolts. When the huecos disappear move around right and step across to a finger crack. Crank $$ locks for a long ways to a ledge.

 Pitch 3 | 5.11 |Swim up the ramp into the steep hands flare. Press past apod and box out the even steeper bulge to a stance. Step right with exposure to a finger and hand crack and the belay on a small stance. Wild pitch!

 Rap the route with two ropes
content.location: On the far right side of the box. Swack up some ledgy terrain to a vegetated left facing corner.Â

content.description: Box shaped alcove across from Mt Florida
